thread.title: Asset Managment Anaylst at Robert Half Technology (West Des Moines, IA)
thread.title_full: Asset Managment Anaylst at Robert Half Technology (West Des Moines, IA)

title: Asset Managment Anaylst at Robert Half Technology (West Des Moines, IA)
text: Classification: Hardware Analyst Compensation: DOE Robert Half Technology has a great long term contract for an Asset Management Analyst! As an Asset Management Specialist, you will be focusing on tracking incoming assets, tracking disposals, verifying invoices and contracts relating to the purchases of technology equipment. Having prior asset management experience managing technology hardware and software is preferred. To be successful in this Asset Management Analyst opportunity, having basic knowledge of hardware and software, Excel skills as well as having great attention to detail, being self-directed, strong communication skills (verbal and written) and good follow-up skills are required. Reach out to Chris at Robert Half Technology for more details on this Asset Management Analyst opportunity, (515) 282-6876, chris.parker@rht.com or www.rht.com.
